front.title: Geocoding and Reverse-geocoding Using Location-to-Service Translation

abstract.t: This document creates new service URNs for geocoding and reverse geocoding location formats to be used by location-to-service translation protocol (LoST) to convert location values into a format of choice. The key words "MUST", "MUST NOT", "REQUIRED", "SHALL", "SHALL NOT", "SHOULD", "SHOULD NOT", "RECOMMENDED", "MAY", and "OPTIONAL" in this document are to be interpreted as described in RFC 2119 [RFC 2119].
